label: 三条実美
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: さんじょう さねとみ
見出し読み_mod: さんじょう さねとみ
説明文: (1837-91). Also: Saneyoshi. Court noble; related by marriage to Yamauchi Yodo. Court offices of moderate importance, 1862-63. Loyalist sympathizer; imperial envoy to Edo, 1862. Fled to Choshu, 1863; later to Kyushu. Returned after Restoration to become senior minister in Meiji government.
